item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump departs G7 early
item.description: The summit comes amid rising international tensions, as Trump and other allies continue their quest for an accord between Russia and Ukraine.

item.title: Trump: 'I don't care' what Gabbard said about Iran not building nuclear weapon

item.title: Minnesota shootings latest: Witness recalls moment she spotted suspect
item.description: Boelter allegedly had firearms and a list of 45 elected officials in notebooks in his car, law enforcement said.
